entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:12 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 01:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 10:47 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:47 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
